Node.Text: My, my, what weather we have this week! I'm afraid the storm doesn't look like it will stop anytime soon.
Good thing it's so warm in the apartments.
Yes, dear, I suppose it is.
Yes it is, but... I don't wish to sour the mood.
Well, it's rather obvious, isn't it? We're practically snowed in with a killer, and the police aren't much help at all!
I don't mean to ramble, but it's a very unstable situation, and I haven't felt safe in days.
I'm sure things will sort themselves out.
Yes, I hope they will, too.
Just the usual. I'll try to keep a low profile.
I'll make some tea and see if I can't find some clues for you. I want this mystery solved posthaste.
What was your relationship with Alex?
I feel remorse for the poor girl, I do, but she should have known better than to stick her nose where it didn't belong.
She was a bit too much of a gossip, in my opinion. I would never wish ill will towards her, but she was a bit too inquisitive for her own good.
She would have done anything to get her hands on the perfect story. It's just a shame that the best one came about with her death.
